module.additional_description: Carts Guru will help you to convert your "almost buyers" into paying customers. Multichannel Retargeting: Emails, Facebook Ads, Instagram, SMS, and Automatic CallsConvert more than 20% of your abandoned cartsAutomatic suggestions to continuously improve your rules Carts Guru is your all-in-one retargeting solution. Try it for free for 14 days, no credit card needed. You only pay a commission when Carts Guru converts your carts. Check our website: https://carts.guru/en/prestashop

module.name: onehopsmsservice
module.description: Sending SMS made easy on Prestashop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Sending SMS made easy on Prestashop. Whether it's sending auto confirmation messages or keeping your customers posted on the delivery status, Onehop can help you improve your Customer Interaction using SMS. Experience the magic of SMS!
module.additional_description: Feature Benefits: Merchants can easily interact with their customers via SMS. Merchants can send automated SMS alerts and notifications to their customers for: Order confirmation when an order is placed.Shipment confirmation when a product is shipped.Delivery confirmation when a product is delivered to the customer.Out of stock alerts for merchants to receive an update when a product is out of stock.Back in stock alerts for the customers when merchants update their stocks. Commercial Benefits: Discounts on purchase of a large volume of SMS credits* Service Benefits: Premium and instant support over Email, Call, Live Chat and Facebook. Free, on-call assistance with onboarding.

module.additional_description: As a merchant based in Europe, offer your customers all over the world the opportunity to pay securely and conveniently at your online shop.  All standard payment methods (card payment, alternative methods incl. purchase on account with payment guarantee)Simple integrationAdditional premium servicesComprehensive support (via email, live chat, telephone)For merchants of all sizes and across all industriesIncluding fraud preventionPersonal merchant loginDetailed reportingOne interface for all payment methodsSolutions for your point of sale (POS, mPOS9)All the benefits of Wirecard AG (risk management, full banking licence, PCI certification)

module.name: worldfirst
module.description: World First – International Payments for Your BusinessInternational payments and foreign exchange solutions for businesses and online marketplace sellers
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: World First – International Payments for Your BusinessInternational payments and foreign exchange solutions for businesses and online marketplace sellers.
module.additional_description: WorldFirst help you make international money transfers quickly, securely and at fantastic exchange rates, which could save you money compared to your bank or online marketplace. So if you need to pay overseas suppliers or repatriate earnings from international marketplaces like Amazon, Newegg or Cdiscount, WorldFirst can help. Click the button in the panel to register your interest with WorldFirst and a member of their team will be in touch to discuss opening an account. Please note this service is available in English, French, Dutch, Chinese and Japanese.

module.name: salesmanago
module.description: #1 Marketing Automation Platform for eCommerce used by over 6k companies. Test it for free with professional support
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: #1 Marketing Automation Platform for eCommerce used by over 6k companies. Test it for free with professional support.
module.additional_description: SALESmanago Marketing Automation for eCommerce What SALESmanago offers for your online store? Converts page views to real customers, monitor what they are doing on your web shop.Automatically does a segmentation based on web shop behaviourCreates & sends personalized content without manual workCreates your own sales chat using bots SALESmanago is a cloud-based online Marketing Automation platform used by over 6,000 companies all over the world, mostly B2C and Online Stores. Using the power of real-time website and mobile application behavior analysis, SALESmanago enables clients to fully personalize email marketing, dynamic website content, social media and mobile marketing. - Licence starts at 0$ per month with on-boarding support included. - Unlimited email campaigns and messages sent - No limits for users and marketing automation actions - One month notice, no risk for your business, you pay if system starts working for you. - Free Customer Training Webinars. 1. Encourage visitors to complete purchases - implemented automated marketing process will be leading the prospect from the acquisition to the point of purchase. In SALESmanago our clients can do this with automation rules or Workflows, by using different channels: personalized emails with abandoned cards, personalized website content(banners with products you visited last time being on the web site, pop-ups, etc.), automated process of sending SMS messages, creating Custom Audiences on Facebook. 2. Encourage visitors to create an account - creating of dynamic pop-up contact forms( the first-time visit we will ask about email, second time we will ask about the name - this will help us to increase the CTR). Also, we can create Gated Content - which you can get just by leaving your contact information(or just email). 3. Provides a product suitable to your customers' needs - personalized emails with abandoned cards

module.name: ps_emailsmanager
module.description: Adapt your emails’ design to your site’s visual identity, to your business, or to the time of the year with the native Email Template Manager module, available by default in your store&rsq
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adapt your emails’ design to your site’s visual identity, to your business, or to the time of the year with the native Email Template Manager module, available by default in your store’s back office! This free module allows you to easily modify the template of your transactional emails, such as the registration confirmation or order confirmation, without hiring a designer.
module.additional_description: This email template installation and management module allows you to interchange and modify your different templates and save your configurations. Depending on the design and level of customization that the developer has allowed, your templates can be customized and allow you to:   modify the emails’ main and secondary colorschoose the text's fontadd links to your social networks and modify their logosinsert images and additional text This tool also allows you to save your transactional emails and the default PrestaShop design. Finally, you don't have to write or translate your emails’ content: the template automatically retrieves the default translations available for the transactional email in PrestaShop!

module.name: worldcoo
module.displayName: Donation Widget | Collaborate with recognized NGOs
module.description: Foster loyalty among your clients and improve your brand image by offering a chance to support recognisable NGOs at no cost
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Foster loyalty among your clients and improve your brand image by offering a chance to support recognisable NGOs at no cost.
module.additional_description: Increase the conversion ratio of your e-commerce site:According to BBMG, more than two million [U1] consumers are redefining their purchasing habits and opting for responsible consumption.Improve your brand image and distinguish yourself from the competition: It has been confirmed that when companies show support for social causes, 93% of the public has a more positive image of the company.Promote loyalty among your users:Take advantage of the opportunity to show your social values. Collaborating in the financing of social projects will help you consolidate the connection with your clients, creating a dialogue and relationship.Take part in social change: Have you asked yourself how many transactions occur during one day? What would happen if we donated one euro with each transaction? Now, you and your clients have the opportunity to create social impact, quickly, easily and without cost.

module.name: cleverreach
module.description: Spotify, Bugatti & DHL send their newsletters with CleverReach®. Why? Because it’s that simple. Benefit from our extensive software & flexible pricing without contract duration
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Spotify, Bugatti & DHL send their newsletters with CleverReach®. Why? Because it’s that simple. Benefit from our extensive software & flexible pricing without contract duration.
module.additional_description: The module directly connects our CleverReach® Email Marketing tool with your PrestaShop. All your important „PrestaShop data“ will instantly and automatically be updated and completed in the CleverReach® newsletter tool. The synchronization saves you time and trouble.  At the same time, you avoid errors that often occur during a manual import and export. Synchronized PrestaShop data:  Newsletter subscriptions and unsubscribesFirst and last name, interests, gender, age, birthday, address details … purchased items, revenue, frequency of purchases, average shopping cart, order number, item number, product name, price, currency, quantity, amount product details of your PrestaShop products like image, text, price, size, material … It’s as simple as that! Use valuable data to create personal offers your customers really want. Your benefits: more opens, more clicks and more conversions! This is the key to increasing sales: your customers buy more and more frequently – Profit. Profit. Profit.  Click on the top right „Download “-button now to download the module and install it in the PrestaShop backend without any great effort.  Afterwards, quickly and easily connect your PrestaShop with CleverReach®, synchronize your shop data and create and send your first email.  CleverReach® is the provider for email marketing for more than 165,000 customers, e.g. Spotify, Levi’s, Playboy, DHL and Amnesty International, in 152 countries. CleverReach® was founded in 2007 in Germany and complies with the highest standards of data protection. Exclusively for PrestaShop customers:Get a 10% discount off your CleverReach® rate for 12 months! Email marketing made easier: discount will automatically provided when creating a new account.

module.name: mailchimpintegration
module.description: Connect your store, sell more stuff. More than 15 million people use MailChimp to create targeted email & ad campaigns to help grow their business
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Connect your store, sell more stuff. More than 15 million people use MailChimp to create targeted email & ad campaigns to help grow their business. When you add the official MailChimp module to your store, you increase the power of both.
module.additional_description: See detailed campaign reports—from engagement to ROI—so you can sell more stuff.Sync and segment your list, then send targeted campaigns based on things like products purchased and amount spent over time.Create abandoned cart emails, send product recommendations, and more.Follow up with, delight, and re-engage your customers using pre-built customer lifecycle automations.Design and send personalized transactional messages—like shipping notifications, invoices, and more—directly through MailChimp.

module.name: ns8csp
module.description: Protect your store from the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Protect your store from the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance. Reduce your store’s chargebacks, increase the effectiveness of your ad campaigns, and ensure quality of your site’s user experience.
module.additional_description: NS8 Complete Storefront Protection uses industry-leading techniques to identify bots and other malicious activity. As a platform-based approach to online threat reduction, NS8 Complete Storefront Protection is designed to help your eCommerce businesses fight the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance. Revenue Killer #1: Order Fraud NS8 Complete Storefront Protection watches and scores every visitor to your store. When we detect suspicious activity before, during, or after an order is placed, it is reflected in the order’s EQ8 score. An order with a low score is most likely fraudulent, and depending on how low the score is, it is held or flagged for manual review. When an order’s score is low enough to be suspicious, but not low enough for the store administrator to confidently cancel the order, NS8 Compete Storefront Protection provides the tools to escalate the order and request e-mail and SMS text verification from the user. If the user verifies their phone number, the store administrator can process the order with confidence. Revenue Killer #2: Advertising Fraud Advertising fraud (especially remarketing fraud) is a huge and growing issue for online merchants. Up to 34% of online advertising campaign budgets are stolen using fraudulent traffic. NS8 Complete Storefront Protection not only scores all of the traffic visiting your store, but it also detects and records the traffic’s source. You will see when, and which, advertising campaigns are delivering low-quality, high-risk, fraudulent traffic. You will be able to save money and increase revenue by eliminating poorly performing campaigns and focusing your budget on the successful campaigns that deliver results. Revenue Killer #3: Poor Performance NS8 Complete Storefront Protection includes five critical monitors that every PrestaShop store should have to ensure their store’s performance and customer experience. These include the monitoring of SSL certificates, being added to a spam list, getting flagged for malware, store pages failing to load correctly, and any drop in performance against the global average of online stores. When an issue arises, you'll be automatically notified immediately via email and/or SMS.

module.name: recolize
module.description: Personalization is a Must-Have for every PrestaShop. Maximize revenue, minimize effort. Easy as pie with Recolize! Use for free, no credit card required
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Personalization is a Must-Have for every PrestaShop. Maximize revenue, minimize effort. Easy as pie with Recolize! Use for free, no credit card required.
module.additional_description: Did you know that most of your shop visitors leave without any interaction?Optimize your traffic with fully-automated personalized product recommendations and excite your customers with the right products at the right time. Your customers will thank you with much higher conversion rates up to 4 timesadditional revenue up to 20 %an improved average order value Start now with the Recolize Plug & Play solution for free.Success-based pricing: after 1.000 clicks on recommendations for free each month you pay only 0,039 € per click.

module.name: ekomiratingsandreviews
module.description: Seamlessly integrate eKomi seller and product review collection with your Prestashop account
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Seamlessly integrate eKomi seller and product review collection with your Prestashop account. Review requests are automatically triggered from your shop backend, and any product reviews will be displayed automatically on corresponding product pages.
module.additional_description: eKomi is the leading third-party review service, specializing in the collection, management and publishing of seller and product reviews and ratings for businesses. Thanks to our constant innovation and market-leading technology, we offer the most varied and flexible review generation methods, allowing you to reach all your clients to pro-actively request their feedback.Automatically collect and display authentic seller and product ratings and reviews.Increase trust in your business and boost customer loyalty to increase sales.Activate your Seller Rating Extension to display stars on your Google Ads and increase your Click-through-rate by 17%.Drive more qualified traffic to your siteIncentivise further purchases with our integrated coupon feature.Decrease returns by displaying product reviews on your corresponding product pages.Overall, the more ratings you get for your business, the more traffic you drive to your site, the more trust you create among current and potential clients, and the more you will boost your sales and ROI - so get started today!

module.name: psaddonsconnect
module.description: 2 in 1: Make security or functional updates easier for all modules in your store and take advantage of an e-commerce tip each week to help you on your way
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: 2 in 1: Make security or functional updates easier for all modules in your store and take advantage of an e-commerce tip each week to help you on your way.
module.additional_description: Once connected to your PrestaShop Addons account with this module, you:will benefit each week from an e-commerce tip, that is a tip to follow related to the e-commerce calendar, which you will find directly on your dashboard (ex: when and how to prepare for Black Friday, back to school promotions, etc.)protect your store by staying up-to-date with the latest on security for modules you have downloaded from PrestaShop Addonstake advantage of new features added to modules you have downloaded from PrestaShop Addons
